title: War - Evolutionary + Greatest Hits (2CD 2014) [FLAC]
description:
"Evolutionary" was War's first new studio album in 20 years. Disc One contains new recordings, Disc Two is a remastered reissue of the 1976 Platinum awarded "Greatest Hits" vinyl release


War - Evolutionary
Label: Far Out Productions/Universal Music - B0020529-02
Format: 2 x CD, Album, Compilation Remastered
Country: US
Released: 2014
Genre: Soul, Blues, Jazz
Style: Funk, Fusion
